channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP SMS

item.title: CVE-2021-24561|2024-08-03T19:35:20.197Z -- unknown -- wp%20sms
item.description: The WP SMS WordPress plugin before 5.4.13 does not sanitise the "wp_group_name" parameter before outputting it back in the "Groups" page, leading to an Authenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue
